objectives.en: The course aims at engaging students in thinking about innovation in the context of creating futures. This includes recognising the limits of prediction and design, dealing with sociotechnical complexity, and learning to engage the present to give rise to desirable futures.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on kaasata õpilasi mõtlema innovatsioonile kui tuleviku loomise viisile. Sealhulgas tegeletakse ennustamise ja kavandamise piiride ja sotsiotehnilise keerukusega mõistmisega. Lisaks uuritakse, kuidas saab tulevikumõtlemist rakendada, et kasutada olevikku kutsumaks esile soositavaid tulevikke.

objectives.en: Specifically, the objectives of the course are:
to share experiences and insights on innovation in the context of futures thinking;
objectives.et: Jagada kogemusi ja arusaamu innovatsioonist tulevikumõtlemise kontekstis;

objectives.en: to give an overview of futures thinking;
to develop a reflective stance on approaching futures.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the course the student is able:
to analyse the various methods with which we engage the future;
to understand the limits of prediction and planning;
to participate in the creation of desirable alternatives for the future.

description.et: Refleksioonipäeviku pidamine kursuse jooksul. Profleksiooni esitamine/Keep the reflection journal during the course.  Submit the proflection form

grade_preconditions.et: Refleksioonipäevik ja profleksioon tuleb esitada 20. jaanuariks 2025/The reflection journal and the proflection form should be submitted by the deadline, January 20, 2025

grade_evaluation.et: Arvestus kujuneb projekti ja esitluse põhjal. / Assessment is based on project work and its presentation.

debt_elimination.et: Kokkuleppel õppejõuga ja vastavalt ÕKE-le. / According to the agreement with the lecturer, following the rules set in university's study regulations.
